price: 25. Hubaal Rabbigaa baa kala xukumi (mu'miniinta iyo gaalada) dhexdooda Maalinta Qiyaamaha waxay isku khilaafsanayeen.
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna rabbaka huwa yafṣilu baynahum yawma al-qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūna
